title: Marc Breeze
text: Marc Breeze (born 11 February 1987) is a <a href="Wales">Welsh</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. A hooker, he played club rugby for the <a href="Cardiff%20Blues">Cardiff Blues</a> having previously played for <a href="Ospreys%20%28rugby%20union%29">Ospreys</a>, <a href="London%20Welsh%20RFC">London Welsh RFC</a>, <a href="Aberavon%20RFC">Aberavon RFC</a> and <a href="Aberavon%20Quins%20RFC">Aberavon Quins RFC</a>.
